sources.title: 1937 Millionenerbschaft ( Inge List, Alfred Abel, Hans Stüwe)
sources.description: Film aus dem deutschen dritten Reich von 1937  Millionenerbschaft.  U.a mit Inge List und Hans Stüwe

metadata.Plot: The daughter of a rich American entices a young German but he does the right thing and gives her up for a German girl. In a separate story thread, a sports instructor inherits a fortune after the death of his uncle.
metadata.Writer: Harald Baumgarten, Axel Eggebrecht, Hans Neumann
metadata.Actors: Friedl Czepa, Inge List, Alfred Abel
